name: Find The Way Back
description:
SUMMARY : 

What happens to heroes after saving the world ? What happens to warriors when peace finally comes ? How will you put your weapons down ?
This game is the story of a hero, coming back home after saving the world. It's a story about finding yourself after fighting and starting to trust again. It's a story about living, not surviving.

CREDITS : 

Gameplay Programming : Alvina Damasio--Razafiarizaka, Emma Fouillat, Enzo Duret

Test QA : Alvina Damasio--Razafiarizaka, Emma Fouillat 

Game design : Enzo Duret 

Level design : Alvina Damasio--Razafiarizaka, Emma Fouillat, Enzo Duret 

Game art : Matéo Simmonet, RPG Main Character by Szadi art, Pixel Art Top Down - Basic by Cainos 

Thanks : Raphaël Marczak, Yoann Bouquey
